backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor definition.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking implemented features to source files and components with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining the romantic theme along with dark mode values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets the Valentine-themed title and mounts the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling unlock, proposal, and acceptance flows, including the evasive No button and tap sequence.
Small conditional warning component shown when an admin token exists in the URL hash.
frontend/src/components/CopyShareLinkAct: Button component that copies a sanitized share URL and briefly shows a confirmation state.
frontend/src/components/PasswordGate.tsx: Password gate flow that first shows a welcome screen, then a password prompt validating against a fixed code.
frontend/src/components/RomanticSceneLay: Layout wrapper providing decorative backgrounds, floating hearts, and top-positioned admin and share-link controls.
frontend/src/components/YesTapSequence.t: A three‑step tap sequence component that cycles images and a final message with keyboard and click support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminLinkNotice.ts: Detects if the URL hash contains an admin token and updates on hash changes, returning a boolean.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveNoButton.ts: Provides position and movement logic for an evasive button that jumps to random locations on hover or touch.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider handling Internet Identity auth client creation, login, logout, and state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables and romantic theme definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/utils/shareLink.ts: Generates share URLs without hash fragments and offers a clipboard copy helper with fallback logic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending colors, animations, utilities, and romantic theme bindings.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current Valentine proposal web app state, including gated password flow, Yes/No interactions, and a looping multi-step post-Yes image sequence. Lists architectural notes, known issues, and existing features for planning updates.
